overview: Lissette Hetterly serves as Vice President of Client Services at DAVID Corporation. She joined DAVID in 1998 and has held a variety of positions of increasing responsibility in Support, Training, Account Management and subsequently her current position as Vice President of Client Services. As the client advocate, Lissette is responsible for the overall satisfaction of every DAVID client and oversees all aspects of the client services department including product implementations, training, client relationships and support. Lissette has over 11 years of risk management and software experience. Prior to joining DAVID Corporation, Lissette held client services roles supporting Fortune 1000 companies at Xpedite Systems and Risk Management Solutions. She earned her undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Pace University.
